name: Burmy Plant Cloak
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

poke_power.name: Wear Cloak
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Burmy Plant Cloak is your Active Pokémon, you may search your discard pile for a basic {G} Energy card and attach it to Burmy Plant Cloak.

attacks.name: Plant Cloak Tackle
attacks.effect: If Burmy Plant Cloak has any {G} Energy attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.
